flowers.name: Blue Harmony
flowers.description: The bohemian spirit and undeniable beauty of `Blue Harmony` are hard to resist. Hints of blue, coupled with ivory and lavender, make it a harmonious choice that is both calming and balancing. It’s the obvious choice for adding some soft sweetness and tranquility to your space.

product.name: Blue Harmony
product.description: The bohemian spirit and undeniable beauty of `Blue Harmony` are hard to resist. Hints of blue, coupled with ivory and lavender, make it a harmonious choice that is both calming and balancing. It’s the obvious choice for adding some soft sweetness and tranquility to your space.
